cleaned_text: Nature Made Kids First Vitamin C Gummies - 125mg, 110 ct Item No. 0380425 Nature Made Kids First Vitamin C Gummies are a dietary supplement that supports immune health and provides antioxidant support so your kids get the nutritional support they need. This Vitamin C supplement also aids in iron absorption. Sourced from high-quality ingredients, these gluten free Vitamin C gummies for kids are gummy vitamins that are made with pectin, not gelatin, and have no artificial flavors, no synthetic dyes, no high fructose corn syrup, and no artificial sweeteners. These Nature Made Vitamin C kids gummies feature a delicious orange flavor with 1 gram of sugar per serving for a great-tasting way your kids can take their dietary supplements. This Nature Made gummy Vitamin C for kids also provides 125 mg of Vitamin C, which is the daily recommended amount. Children ages 4-18 chew one kids Vitamin C gummy daily. Nature Made supplements are quality you can trust. Based on a survey of pharmacists who recommend branded vitamins and supplements. - Immune support supplement: contains one 110 count bottle of Nature Made Kids First Vitamin C Gummies for a 110-day supply - These children's Vitamin C supplements support immune health and offer antioxidant support - These Nature Made Vitamin C gummies feature a delicious orange flavor with 1 gram of sugar per serving for a great-tasting way to take a Vitamin C supplement - Children ages 4-18 chew one kids Vitamin C gummy antioxidant supplement daily - This Nature Made Vitamin C kids gummy is gluten free, made with pectin not gelatin, with no artificial flavors, no artificial sweeteners, no synthetic dyes and no high fructose corn syrup - These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.
